title: Bug 47910: ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF
description: When using ajc with the outjar option, the resulting jar file does not contain the expected MANIFEST.MF file inside.
OB: Currently, when the outjar option is used, the generated jar file does not include the expected METAINF/MANIFEST.MF file.
EB: The expected behavior is that when the outjar option is used, the resulting jar file should include a valid MANIFEST.MF file inside the METAINF folder.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Compile a Java file with ajc using the outjar option.
2. Inspect the generated jar file and verify that it does not contain the MANIFEST.MF file in the METAINF folder.
